name: Gary Whiteside
text: Great appraiser.  With property prices down I was holding my breath. He got me all the market would bear. I had real expectations. Would recommend or use again.

name: Tina Johnson
text:
I got my Appraisal back from Mr. Rogers and when I stopped crying I canceled my refinance!!! I was absolutely shocked and appalled at the amount he valued my home/property!
I expected at his age that he had more experience, I was wrong 🤷‍♀️
I would never recommend him to anyone!

name: Dennis Hodtwalker
text: I closed in my home today. The closing was supposed to be 4 business days ago but we have to reschedule the closing 4 times due Gill Johnson submitting the appraisal with the same errors over and over. I had to personally call and find out what was going on and get the issue corrected because apparently he was not communicating with the lending company. If you ever have to have a house appraised DO NOT let anyone suggest him!!!!!!!!

name: maharet64
text: These guys are great to work with. They communicate well and their turnaround is generally quite good.  Highly recommend.

name: Austin and Britney Parker
text: Awesome place and great people to work with!

name: Jill Ainsworth
text: My husband and I recently worked with Katie Fuller to purchase our first home. We could have never dreamed the experience could be so effortless on our part. Katie steered us in the right direction for financing and helped to make sure we found the perfect home to meet our families needs. She was such a pleasure to work with and we are so very thankful for her and everything she did for us!!

name: Eric Jaggers
text: Family owned, Real Estate appraisal firm that has been in business for over 21 years.
